name: 鄧道興
objective: 介紹一階常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，及解非均勻方程式的一般方法，以及Bessel與 Strum Liouville 問題,並介紹 Laplace轉換與數值分析。
schedule:
1.The Laplace Transform
The Inverse Transform and Transforms of Derivatives
2.Translation Theorems
3.Additional Operational Properties
4.The Dirac Function
5.Systems of Linear Differential Equations
6.Series Solutions of Linear Differential Equations
Solutions about Ordinary Points
7.Solutions about Singular Points
8.Special Functions
9.Mid-term Exam
10.Numerical Solutions of Ordinary Differential Equations
Euler Methods and Error Analysis
11.Runge-Kutta Methods;Multistep Methods
12.Higher-Order Equations and Systems
13.Second-Order Boundary-Value Problems
14.Vectors Vector Spaces
15.Gram-Schmidt Orthogonalization Process
16.Matrices Matrix Algebra
17.Determinants;Inverse of a Matrix; Cramer's Rule
18.Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Term Performance Including Attendance and Homework(30%)
Mid-term Exam(35%)
Final Exam(35%)
materials:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics 3rd Edition
Dennis G. Zill
Michael R. Cullen
